listitem.para: ELLIPSEARC2 draws part of or all of an ellipse based on the turtle heading, turtle position and given arguments. The ellipse starts at the turtle's current position and sweeps by the amount of angle starting at startangle. The size is based on the minor and major values. The minor parameter is the shortest distance from the ellipse to the center point. The major is the longest distance from the ellipse the center point.
Unlike ELLIPSEARC, ELLIPSEARC2 moves the turtle.

programlisting.userinput: ; a 2D example ELLIPSEARC2 360 100 200 0 CLEARSCREEN ELLIPSEARC2 90 50 50 0 CLEARSCREEN ELLIPSEARC2 90 50 50 90
